DOC.brief_title: The Role of MSC in the Treatment of Fistulas in Patients With Perianal Crohn's Disease
DOC.detailed_description: Peri-anal fistula is common seen in Crohn's disease. Treatments including surgery, antibiotics, immunosuppressive drug and infliximab improve the quality of life of the patients suffering Crohn's perianal fistula, but the recurrent rate is still high. MSC showed promising effect in the therapy of CD, but the standard treatment strategy is unclear. Here investigators will carry out this phase II clinical trial to explore a effective therapeutic regimen of MSC in the Crohn's perianal fistula.
